conbody.p: This file contains a simple list of paragraphs which are CSV delimited names of meeting participants. The file shall not have a title and ot has the outputclass = noprint which prevents it from being included into the PDF file
You can however give it a title and remove the outputclass = noprint if you use the ditaval selection during processing.

The file is required to generate the files
ContactsAddr.dita which contains a list of the selected contacts including availability information after running the CreateContacts.xsl stylesheet.
ContactsImg.dita which is the same as ContactsAddr.dita but in addition uses images in the first column to make the appearance more attractive.
The participants need to be listed in an unsorted list as follows.
